Romanodes: 30ml of espresso served with slice of lemon
Macchiatodes: 30 ml of espresso with milk foam
Affogatodes: 30 ml of espresso with scoop ice cream
Cappuccinodes: A cup of Cappuccino with the flavor you want
Flatwhitedes: A cup of flat white with the flavor you want
Lattedes: A cup of latte with the flavor you want
Spanishlattedes: A cup of iced or hot latte with the spanish flavor
Pistachiolattedes: A cup of iced or hot latte with Pistachio flavor
Lotuslattedes: A cup of iced or hot latte with lotus flavor
Hazelnutlattedes: A cup of iced or hot latte with hazelnut flavor
Roselattedes: A cup of iced or hot latte with rose flavor
Frappedosedes: A mix of frozen espresso with milk and ice with the flavor you like
Icedchocolatedes: Mix of milk and chocolate and ice
Mariattodosodes: A mix especially made in our cafe served with shot espresso or without
